name: Space Between Us
description: There is space between us. Between you and I. Us and them. Them amongst themselves. I wonder why... Watching the earth from up here. I see too much space, not enough of us. Too much bickering, too much fighting, too many wars. Not enough of us. Wars can outnumber us. When will we ever realize, we are the same species? and we are fighting a war that cannot be won.
